ygData.subject: The Unrest Chronicles
ygData.msgSnippet: So, I have been in a semi-bored slump trying to Power level to get to 20 at least by friday. Currently I am 18 and then some. Got a while to 18 so.. everything
ygData.messageBody:
So, I have been in a semi-bored slump trying to Power level to get to 20 at
least by friday. Currently I am 18 and then some. Got a while to 18 so..
everything I can tonight, I will be gaming like crazy. Soloing in Unrest is
actually alot of fun.. there is never a dull moment for me. I can kill 3
Blues to me before I have to med. This also Includes the Death Beetles that
attack at the same time. So I am doing pretty good I think. Anyhow, Is there
any suggestions on Good Loot mobs in game at my level. My character is Mage,
so preferably a mage type item would be perfect.

Thanks

Nate of the Norrath's Light
18th Circle of life
